attributes.action: Call a general election before invoking article 50 of the Lisbon treaty.
attributes.additional_details: It is in the interest of everyone that such seismic changes to the future of the United Kingdom are carried out in a transparent and open manner.
attributes.background: I would like a general election to be called prior to invoking article 50, so that a newly elected government can proceed with a mandate to leave or remain in the EU under terms set in the elected governments manifesto. Given that both sides in the EU referendum made dishonest claims.
